nodes.text: Jen Alkier was a Strategic Information Service Colonel who went on a mission to Wild Space to search for the Sith Emperor's mysterious vaults after receiving a tip from a Sith informant. Several weeks after the agent journeyed to Wild Space, all contact with Alkier's ship was lost and Alkier was designated as a missing agent. Many months later, Alkier's abandoned ship was found on Korriban with no visible damage apart from a wiped memory core and a missing astromech droid.
Jen Alkier is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne in the codex entry for The Emperor's Vaults.
